reviews.review: 8 thousand hours in this game. Valve makes it free to play. 2-5 cheaters in every single matchmake, casual server, retake server, execute server, faceit server...Valve doesn't care about their loyal player base at all. Game is unplayable now, they killed their game making it free to cheat.
I LIKE EVERTIHING IN THIS GAME
é o melhor jogo do mundo!!!!

An obvious aim hacker was on our team so I reported him and called a vote to kick him.... the vote didn't pass. and they called a vote to kick me even though everybody it was clear he was hacking (turning 180 degrees and boom.. headshot). 

That vote passed. 

Valve, you suck at anti cheat technology. Actually, you suck in general.

Uninstalled.
strongly recommend it for people who want to learn insults and swear words in russian
Bedava olduktan sonra çok hile geldi.
makes me rage about 3 times a week would recommend
